mapper.select: select name from tbl_customer where name like '%' #{name} '%'

select c.id, u.name as owner, c.name, c.website, c.phone, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.description, c.address from tbl_customer c join tbl_user u on c.owner = u.id where c.id = #{id}
select a.id, a.name, u.name as owner, a.website, a.phone, a.createTime from tbl_customer a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id order by a.createTime desc limit #{skipCount}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from tbl_customer a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer( id, owner, name, website, phone, createBy, createTime, contactSummary, nextContactTime, description, address ) values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{website}, #{phone}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{description}, #{address} )
